text: This is a sample chunk of text for class 8 science. It covers the basics of physics and includes important concepts such as force and motion.
subject: science

text: In this chapter, we will explore the concept of force. Force is defined as an interaction that causes an object to change its velocity.
subject: science

text: Motion is the change in position of an object with respect to time. There are different types of motion, including linear and rotational motion.
subject: science

text: The laws of motion, formulated by Sir Isaac Newton, describe the relationship between the motion of an object and the forces acting on it.
subject: science

text: Understanding these concepts is crucial for studying more advanced topics in physics and for practical applications in everyday life.
subject: science
